Within the BeerController.setPrice(String, double, String) method (Business Layer), an attempt to change a beer price is made.

UserMapper - Class in edu.rit.p3.data.entity.mapper
An instance of UserMapper is used by the BeerJdbcManager (Data Layer) to more efficiently extract User entities from a given SQLite ResultSet.

UserNotFoundException - Exception in edu.rit.p3.data.exception
Within some methods of the BeerJdbcManager (Data Layer), an attempt at finding a User with a certain username may not exist.
UserNotFoundException(String) - Constructor for exception edu.rit.p3.data.exception.UserNotFoundException
 
UserUnderageException - Exception in edu.rit.p3.data.exception
Within the BeerJdbcManager.updateUserToken(User) method (Data Layer), an attempt at creating an authorization token for a User with a certain username may not may not be allowed because a user is under a certain age.
UserUnderageException(User, int) - Constructor for exception edu.rit.p3.data.exception.UserUnderageException
